text: This article lists the members of the People's Representative Council from 2004 to 2009. The 16th People's Representative Council follows the 2004 Indonesian legislative election held on 5 April 2004. There are 550 elected MPs in the Parliament. == Speaker and Deputy Speaker == {| class="wikitable" !Name !Photo !Position !Party !Notes |- |Agung Laksono |142x142px |Speaker |Golkar | |- |Soetardjo Soerjogoeritno |100px |Deputy Speaker |Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle | |- |Muhaimin Iskandar |100px |Deputy Speaker |National Awakening Party | |- |Zaenal Maarif |142x142px |Deputy Speaker |Reform Star Party | |} == List of members == === Aceh === {| class="wikitable sortable" !Name !Constituency !Party !Votes !Notes |- |M.
